item.title: Test1
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.

item.title: Visualizing Strava Activities with R
item.description: Strava is an internet service for tracking human exercise which incorporates social network features - it is sometimes referred to as “Facebook for cyclist”. Strava provides tools for analysing activities and relative performance - however there are no native Strava tools to visualise activities.

item.title: Sentiment Analysis of Tweets to Irish Banks
item.description: Analysing sentiment based on a text string is pretty classic introductory problem in the field of Machine Learning. The idea is seductively simple - by analysing the data of publically available tweets is it possible to discern or extrapolate some additional analysis.

item.title: About
Bookshelf
item.description: Business: General business books covering everything from strategy to scandals: The Innovator’s Dilemma: When New Technologies Cause Great Firms to Fail Essential reading. Thought provoking book on why despite doing all the right things your business can still end up being overtaken by disrupters.
